name: Pokédex iOS
body:
> This project is ongoing, and far from complete. If you would like to contribute, see the [Contribution](#contribution) section.

Pokédex–iOS is a versatile, lightweight virtual [Pokédex](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Pok%C3%A9dex) for your iPhone or iPod Touch.

# Contribution

If you would like to contribute a feature to this project, [email me](mailto:pokedex@chipthrasher.com) first. Once I approve of your idea, you can create a pull request with your changes. Changes made in the Xcode project should be made to the [pokedex-xcode](https://github.com/pokedex-ios/pokedex-xcode) repository, because that contains the source code for this project. If you want to contribute to artwork / sprites, use the [pokedex-artwork](https://github.com/pokedex-ios/pokedex-artwork) repository.

# Feedback

Contact me at [pokedex@chipthrasher.com](mailto:pokedex@chipthrasher.com) for feedback purposes, and my personal email is [the@chipthrasher.com](mailto:the@chipthrasher.com). 

(Don't spam me. Just don't. In fact, _never_ spam a programmer. I will track you down...)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
